programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fearing that Hitler will destroy his beloved Germany, Col. Claus von Stauffenberg (Tom Cruise) joins a group of high-ranking men who are plotting to assassinate him.

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: During the Vietnam War, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale), a U.S. fighter pilot, is shot down over Laos and taken captive by enemy soldiers.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honor needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Enraged by the killing of his wife, Scotsman William Wallace (Mel Gibson) leads a revolt against the tyrannical English king (Patrick McGoohan) in the 13th century.

programme.title: Platoon
programme.desc: Two sergeants (Tom Berenger, Willem Dafoe) and a private (Charlie Sheen) join others lost in war along the 1967 Cambodian border.

programme.title: The Obsession of Carter Andrews
programme.sub-title: Our Tales of Tahitian Waters: Tahiti Part 1
programme.desc: A locale that millions dream about; a fishery that Zane Grey wrote about; an adventure that Carter Andrews gets to embark upon.

programme.title: Livin' the Dream With Captain Jimmy Nelson
programme.desc: Capt. Jimmy and Luiza head to Crocodile Bay Resort in Costa Rica to reel in a variety of south-pacific, reef species.

programme.title: Bill Dance Saltwater
programme.desc: The emerald green waters surrounding the Destin, Florida, area are loaded with redfish, as Bill finds out along with guide Josh Nelson.

programme.title: The Seahunter
programme.desc: Rob and his good friend Capt. Paul Tejera set off for their first time together trying for Sailfish, and the conditions couldn't have lined up any better.

programme.title: BigWater Adventures
programme.desc: BigWater Adventures is traveling down under for some of Mark's childhood bucket-list fish, along with a few surprises.

programme.title: Two Conchs Sportfishing TV
programme.desc: Captain Jack Carlson is planning a special day out on the water for his son Tucker, it's his 17th birthday and they're going to celebrate Two Conchs style.

programme.title: Spear Life

programme.title: The Nightcap
programme.desc: On The Nightcap we explore and question other lifestyles and cultures with an enthusiastic, open mind and hope to leave our viewers happily pondering new perspectives. The show's unique set has a full bar with a rotating cast of bartenders pouring up unique cocktails you can try to replicate at home. Whether it's inviting the most provocative guests to the signature pink couch or hearing your take on controversial topics, the conversations never disappoint. From game night to ordering in munchies, The Nightcap will keep you wanting more. It's sexy, it's risqu, it's everything you wouldn't expect from late-night TV.

programme.title: The Pulse With Bill Anderson
programme.desc: The Pulse with Bill Anderson is a weekly tv program and podcast featuring topical discussions and interviews surrounding current local issues, events, and entertainment. Each week Bill will welcome guests from all walks of life to talk about the topics that have the attention of our community and beyond. The Pulse will air weekly on FOX 29 in Philly as well as FOX Soul nationwide and be distributed on all major podcast outlets. In addition to hosting The Pulse Bill also manages the content of the station's special reports, including the Our Race Reality series of segments and specials. He also reports on the brighter side of life in his regular news series For Goodness' Sake.

programme.title: The Nightcap
programme.desc: On The Nightcap we explore and question other lifestyles and cultures with an enthusiastic, open mind and hope to leave our viewers happily pondering new perspectives. The show's unique set has a full bar with a rotating cast of bartenders pouring up unique cocktails you can try to replicate at home. Whether it's inviting the most provocative guests to the signature pink couch or hearing your take on controversial topics, the conversations never disappoint. From game night to ordering in munchies, The Nightcap will keep you wanting more. It's sexy, it's risqu, it's everything you wouldn't expect from late-night TV.
